id: Argos - Ideas Bank | Free Notion Template
name: Argos - Ideas Bank | Free Notion Template
description: Never lose an idea again, this template is designed to save your ideas. No matter if it's a crazy idea or a feasible one. Write it down!How to use this template?- After purchasing it, you will be redirected to Notion.- In the upper right corner, click on the duplicate button (this will make a copy of the template in your workspace).- Now you will have a space where you can write down all your ideas, with this Notion template!What's inside?- Processes to capture ideas- Lists to store ideas- Areas
